name: The 8 Cities Game
description:
THIS IS A EVENT WHERE YOU HAVE TO COLLECT ALL

 THE GREEN CUBES WITHIN

THE GIVEN TIME  TO REPAIR YOU CAR AS FAST AS POSSIBLE.

 THEIR ARE TOTALLY 20 GREEN CUBES WHICH YOU 

HAVE TO COLLECT. THEIR ARE NO WALLS TO

 PROJECT YOU FROM FALLING DOWN BUT YOU CAN

 PRESS LETTER "R" TO RESTART AND

 LETTER "P" TO PAUSE. YOU CAN TRY

 FREE PLAY ALSO (THERE ARE NO

 GREEN CUBES IN FREE PLAY)).

ENJOY AND HAVE FUN!!!
